reviews.text:
Bwoy, di service inna dis place terrible fi true. Di first ting yuh notice when yuh step inside is how miserable di servers look. Mi nuh know wah kinda stress dem under, but di whole energy off. Sometimes mi just walk in, look ‚Äòpon di faces dem, and turn right back out.

Today mi decide fi give dem one more try, but di lady come like she waan serve mi wah she feel like, not wah mi order. Mi haffi tell yuh, mi vex bad. Mi end up flip her off and walk out. Mi done wid dem ‚Äî mi nah step foot inna dat place again. Good luck to dem, ‚Äòcause wid dem attitude deh, customers a go run weh fast-fast.
Not bad basic

Great fried dumplings and fried chicken. Oxtail needs a lil salt and something else. Morning porridges and cornmeal and morning crispy fried fish pieces are amazing.‚Äò Mac n cheese okay.
Brown stew chicken, Mac & cheese and cabbage
Good

This is the ONLY Jamaican restaurant I purchase food from in the Bronx for the past 7.5 years. I am their number one fan for curried cowfoot! And Annie knows this (lol) as I used to travel from CT just to purchase it on Wednesdays; but now they do it for 3 days per week. The quality and taste of the food has been consistent all these years as well. Keep it up FrontPage!
for those don loke spicy food .Don‚Äôt ask if the food is spicy bc they gonna lie to you Jamaica ppl so strong

Strolled in here during closing on a saturday night. They didnt have much. But the gentleman took the time out to put something together for me because expressed how famished i was. I really appreciate it. The foods good too. Especially the fried chicken

Based on my observation customer service I must say needs to be a bit more pleasant...... like a smile and greeting all customer won't hurt but will improve the experience. Some of these rude remarks are not necessary. Overall I will give them three stars.

The tall ugly lady with dreads has a terrible additude especially to kids! if u get her upset she will mess your order up and then when u walk away call u a b word. the food is meh and there was a hair ball in my dads food and i brung it back and she refused to take it back and refund me DONT EAT HERE!!!

The customer service here is TERRIBLE. The workers are incompetent and don‚Äôt take direction well. One day I had to go back and forth with the worker over her getting my order wrong. Food is okay but not good enough to deal with the high level of disrespect in the workplace.
